data.name: The Great Dick Invasion
data.detailed_description:
About the Game

-If you ever dreamed of saving the earth from a legion of dicks, then this is the game for you!

-Or if you generally just like Tower Defense games with a fun twist, then this is the game for you too ;b


The Rules


-The Dick legion attacks through one portal or several in each level.
-You have to build your base and defend your main building.

The Game Currency


The Dickcoin

-The Dickcoin is the most important element in the game.
-It allows you to build everything in your base.
-It can only be obtained by building Generators or by killing enemies and defeating waves.

Upgrading



The Gold Stars

-More important than having lots of defensive towers is upgrading them, otherwise your base will fall faster than a house of cards.
-Use Gold Stars to upgrade.
-Gold Stars are gained by defeating waves of enemies.
-You can also upgrade towers already built on the battlefield using Dickcoins. You will pay a value for each individual tower, making it more expensive for the player to upgrade this way, but very useful in desperate situations.

Campaign




-The Campaign consists of many missions that will be unlocked as the player progresses.
-Will you be able to save the earth and take the fight to the evil Dicktator's Flagship?

Good luck and Have Fun!!!

data.short_description: After a series of apocalyptic climate events, Earth is now under attack by a legion of penis shaped aliens who seek to wipeout what remains of the human race. Defend what is left of mankind's most iconic landmarks in this fast-paced crazy Tower Defense game.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: Like you should expect this game contains lots of characters that resemble genital organs.
